title: Stage S13
description: Level 1 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: There is a book on the desk.
There are two windows in the room.
learning_points: Level 1 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 책상 위에 책이 한 권 있습니다.
sentences.en: There is a book on the desk.
There are two windows in the room.
There is no one at home.
There are many people in the park.
There isn't any milk in the fridge.

sentences.kr: 테이블 위에 사과가 몇 개 있습니다.
sentences.en: There are some apples on the table.
Is there a bank near here?
There are three cars in the garage.
There's a good restaurant downtown.
There aren't any tickets left.

sentences.kr: 책상 위에 책이 한 권 있습니다.
sentences.en: There is a book on the desk.
There are two windows in the room.
There is no one at home.
There are many people in the park.
There isn't any milk in the fridge.

sentences.kr: 테이블 위에 사과가 몇 개 있습니다.
sentences.en: There are some apples on the table.
Is there a bank near here?
There are three cars in the garage.
There's a good restaurant downtown.
There aren't any tickets left.
I remember the day when we first met.
That is the place where I was born.
Give me a reason why you did that.
This is the house where I grew up.
Do you remember the time when we were students?

sentences.kr: 도서관은 조용히 공부할 수 있는 곳이에요.
sentences.en: The library is a place where I can study quietly.
I don't understand the reason why he left.
Summer is the season when I feel happiest.
The park is where we usually meet.

sentences.kr: 졸업했던 순간을 절대 잊지 못할 거예요.
sentences.en: I'll never forget the moment when I graduated.
I remember the day when we first met.
That is the place where I was born.

This is the house where I grew up.
Do you remember the time when we were students?

sentences.kr: 도서관은 조용히 공부할 수 있는 곳이에요.
sentences.en: The library is a place where I can study quietly.
I don't understand the reason why he left.
Summer is the season when I feel happiest.
The park is where we usually meet.

sentences.kr: 졸업했던 순간을 절대 잊지 못할 거예요.
sentences.en: I'll never forget the moment when I graduated.
